mapper.select: select * from species where species_type=1 and has_homolog=1 order by common_name
select * from species where species_type=2 and has_homolog=1 order by common_name
select * from species where has_homolog=1 order by common_name
select * from species where classification=#{classification} and has_homolog=1
select data_source from species where taxon_id=#{taxonid}
select data_source from species where common_name=#{speciesName}
select classification from species where taxon_id=#{taxid}
select common_name from species_statistic where has_homolog=1
select distinct(species_common_name) from trait_all_1 where trait_id=#{traitID} and classification=#{speciesType} and hdb_gene_id is not null and hdb_gene_id!='' order by species_common_name
select distinct(species_common_name) from variation_all where var_name=#{traitID} and classification=#{speciesType} and hdb_gene_id is not null and hdb_gene_id!='' order by species_common_name

select distinct(species_common_name) as common_name ,a.taxon_id,has_homolog from gene_go_all as a inner join species on a.taxon_id=species.taxon_id where top_go_id=#{topGoId} and a.classification=#{speciesType} and has_homolog =1 order by species_common_name

select distinct(a.common_name),a.taxon_id,has_homolog from gene_expression as a inner join species on a.taxon_id=species.taxon_id where annotation=#{expName} and a.classification=#{speciesType} and has_homolog =1 order by a.common_name
